greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 iff 6n-1 is prime.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
example: a(5) = 1 because 6*5-1 is prime, a(6) = 0 since 6*6-1 is composite.
program: (MAGMA) [IsPrime(6*n-1) select 1 else 0: n in[1..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 19 2019
results.author: _Washington Bomfim_, Oct 27 2009
